title: Surgical Atlas of Pediatric Otolaryngology
abstract: I. Otologic Surgery Tympanostomy Tubes and Related Procedures- Charles D. Bluestone Approaches to the Middle Ear and Mastoid- Charles D. Bluestone Maringoplasty and Tympanoplasty- Charles D. Bluestone Ossiculoplatsy- Batti/ Bluestone Mastoidectomy and Cholesteatoma- Charles D. Bluestone Perilymphatic Fistula and Eustachian Tube Surgery- Charles D. Bluestone Facial Nerve Exploration and Repair- Raymond L. Hilsinger Jr. Ear Canal Stenosis and Artesia- Simon C. Parisier Cochlear Implants- Noel L. Cohen II. Rhinologic Surgery Epistaxis- Scott C. Manning Nasal and Septal Deformities- Jon b. Turk/W. Crysdale Congenital Nasal Malformations- Margaret A. Kenna Endoscopic Ethmoidectomy and Antrostomy- Glenn Isaacson Inflammatory Sinonasal Disease- Anrew J. Hotaling Sphenosis Sinus Surgery- Gady Har-El III. Oral and Pharyngeal Surgery Surgery of the Tongue- Carlos Gonzales Tonsillectomy, Adenoidectomy, and UPPP- Ari. J. Goldsmith Velopharyngeal Insufficiency- J. Paul Wilging Surgery of Drooling- William S. Crysdale IV. Head and Neck Surgery Cervical Adenopathy- Michael J. Cunningham Deep Neck Infections- Charles F. Koopman Jr. Congenital Malformations of the Neck- Mark A. Richardson Salivary Gland Surgery- Michael J. Cunningham Thyroidectomy- Michael J. Cunningham V. Endoscopy and Airway Surgery Endoscopy of the Upper Aerodigestive Tract- Kenny H. Chan Tracheostomy- Casselbrant Surgery of the Larynx and Trachea- Gerald B. Healy, Greg Licamelli Laryngotracheal Laser Surgery- Jay A. Werkhaven VI. Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery Soft Tissue Surgery- Charles W. Gross Articular Repair of Microtia- Roland D. Eavey Otoplasty for Lop Ear- Dennis Lee, Charles D. Bluestone Maxillofacial Trauma- TBD Cleft lip and Palate- Robin Dyleski, Robert W. Seibert Craniofacial Surgery- Lawrence J. Marentette VII. Appendix Information for Parents and Caregivers- Richard M. Rosenfeld
